title: So, I was 294% more honorable that the average player, i think?
body:
So, as you can see in the image, about a week ago or so I got a notification, loading up league of legends, that told me  i was 294% more Honorable than the average person.
I just... I mean... is this even possible? ( Edit, this is supposed to be a kind of rhetorical question. I understand how it works, i'm just surprised at the number)

https://imgur.com/a/vyjCV

replies.body:
> I just... I mean... is this even possible?

Remember the averages around here.

RNG works with player honors too. You could get team after team after team that just honors you for tilt proof. I got a TON of key fragments for being a leader despite me playing completely silently 99% of the time (and casually flaming the other 1%). If you're doing the best on your team most of the time your teammates honor you with whatever they feel like.

Do you not understand math?

BTW

[img]https://i.imgur.com/eNSyOBd.png[/img]

> [{quoted}](name=FailedAbortion,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=FEy8kjcR,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-24T01:56:33.907+0000)
>
> Do you not understand math?
> 
> BTW
> 
> [img]https://i.imgur.com/eNSyOBd.png[/img]

Yeah I can understand it.
I'm just wondering that it's such a high number considering all others i've gotten is 60% or so (Roughly)
But jesus, that 647% though.

hm... and i was wondering why for me it always says around 50-60%.
now im even more confused

also wow for almost 300% only 1 keyfrag? cmon riot :D
